duties_responsibilities.duty: Design, develop, and execute the vision of the cybersecurity framework and solutions for client services.
Ensure highly scalable, reliable, and secure solutions across the solution set.
Familiarity with industry standard frameworks and compliance requirements such as NIST 800, ISO 27001, CMMC, FISMA, GDPR, NERC-CIP, SOC 2, HIPAA, FERPA, FINRA, PCI-DSS, ITARS, DFARS, and CCPA.
Play a lead role in developing the cybersecurity portfolio and solution delivery.
Assist in investigating security events and providing coaching and mentoring to other team members.
Lead all cybersecurity focused tasks and engagements.
Promote information and cybersecurity throughout the internal organization and with clients.
Advise on emerging vulnerabilities and newly introduced risks to internal and client resources.
Provide technical leadership for all information and cybersecurity platforms.
Serve as the final escalation point for all information and cybersecurity related platforms and technical issues.
Oversee and participate in the administration of all information and cybersecurity technology platforms.
Take a lead role in threat hunting, detection, and response to cybersecurity incidents.
Select new information and cybersecurity platforms and solutions.
Execute regular technical risk assessments of systems and infrastructure.
Manage the installation, configuration, and monitoring of new information and cybersecurity platform technologies.
Provide maintenance assistance to all information and cybersecurity platform technologies.
Provide coaching and mentoring on information and cybersecurity platform technologies.
Articulate the value of information and cybersecurity within the business to internal team members and client stakeholders.
Maintain current security certifications and attend industry seminars and relevant continuing education events.
Support the sales team to produce solutions for customers.
Build and manage strong relationships with distributors and partners for technical support, configurations, and pricing related to information and cybersecurity products.
Work directly with clients and the team to support quoting and procurement requests.
Establish strong relationships with business operational and service delivery units.
Build relationships with customers technical and management staff.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Information Technology, Cybersecurity, or a related field (Master's preferred)
